name: Kelly's Chicken Coop Caper
description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!

I made this for my girlfriend Kelly's 21st birthday! She really likes chickens so I made her a game about pushing chickens around. It's pretty short (there are only seven levels) but I hope you like it anyways!

  • programming + music + misc art by me
  • title screen artwork by ink
  • ingame tiles from surt + DragonDePlatino's incredible Zoria tileset 
  • the chickens are edits from link's awakening
